#Text=Develop English Communication Skills
#Text=Development of English communication when it 's not your first language can be done through various ways .
#Text=This article presents a few of the most useful ways to boost your English communication skills at home , with friends and when out and about .
#Text=Apart from the English is one of the top survival language in the world .
#Text=So developing communication of such language leads to furnish you career path too .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Build up your confidence to communicate boldly in English .
#Text=Pay attention to your mistakes and correct them .
#Text=Speak English with your family and friends whenever you have the chance to do so .
#Text=Fake it till you make it .
#Text=Plunge in and try it , the sooner you do , the better your English will become .
#Text=Mistakes are inevitable for every language learner but it is through these that you will learn .
#Text=Find someone who speaks English well and practice with them .
#Text=Use fillers ( such as basically , well , certainly , you know , etc. ) .
#Text=With the help of these , you can gain yourself time to search internally for the needed vocabulary .
#Text=Watch Hollywood movies and the news in English .
#Text=This is the best way of developing your vocabulary and strengthening your communication skills .
#Text=In addition , movies have the added advantage of allowing you to develop both vocabulary and accents too .
#Text=If you do n't like to watch movies , just switch to news so that you can learn a more formal style of English .
#Text=Try to watch movies with subtitles for 3 to 4 months ; doing that can help you to learn vocabulary .
#Text=After that try to watch without the subtitles ; this helps you to learn the accent and develop your listening skills .
#Text=If you ca n't follow the newsreader , just read the headlines at the bottom so that you can learn some new words .
#Text=Use cards .
#Text=Get a set of plain white cards .
#Text=Write a new word on one side and the meaning on the other side .
#Text=Whenever you are free , start looking at these cards .
#Text=After a while , just look at the meaning and guess the word ( and vice versa ) .
#Text=You can use the cards with your friends to make a word puzzle and perhaps some sorts of games .
#Text=Additionally you can use cards in a different way .
#Text=For an example you can write the lyrics of the songs in card and carry those with you while listening .
#Text=You can sing along with the song which boost you accent skills .
#Text=Try to keep a personal note book for writing daily happenings .
#Text=If you start writing daily a page .
#Text=You will know the difference of you vocabulary strength .
#Text=If you are a creative thinker , try to write some creative and imaginary stories .
#Text=Which will develop your vocabulary and content developing skills .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Try to have friends who can talk in English on your social sites .
#Text=Start reading child story books .
#Text=It is very interesting because you can see lot of pictures along with words .
#Text=So that you can remember it too easily .
